short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Rank for Google search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Search Rank Viewer enhances your Google search experience by displaying rank numbers next to each search result. Whether you're browsing regular web pages or video results, this extension helps you keep track of result positions, even as you navigate through multiple pages of results.

Key Features:
üìå Rank Numbers: Automatically displays the rank of each search result, starting from the first result on the current page.
‚ùå Exclusions: Ignores sponsored ads and "People also ask" sections to provide an accurate rank list.
üîÑ Pagination Support: Rank numbers increment seamlessly as you browse through subsequent pages of search results.
üåç Global Support: Works across all Google domains, including regional versions like google.co.in, google.co.uk, and more.

How to Use:
Install the extension and enable it in your browser.
Perform a Google search, and you'll see rank numbers automatically added to each result.
Navigate to the next page of results, and the numbering will continue from where the previous page left off.
This lightweight and intuitive extension is perfect for SEO professionals, marketers, and anyone who wants a clearer view of search result positions.

Get Google Search Rank Viewer now and simplify your search result analysis!
